name: .QC File Extension
summary: Learn about .QC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File written in the QuakeC programming language, which was originally used for the first-person shooter game Quake; contains syntax similar to the C programming language; used for writing game artificial intelligence and other components.

content: QC files can be compiled using qcc, the QuakeC compiler, which was provided to the public sometime after Quake was released. Other compilers were subsequently built that enhanced QuakeC's capabilities to include other language constructs.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
